title: Short Notes
summary: Short Notes allows you to have important information always at hand or wrist

descriptionHTML:
Short Notes is a modern and beautiful short notes application!
Short Notes is available for free!
Short Notes is available for Android Wear! Never again you will have to get your wallet to know your tax id.
Important Notes is specifically designed for very short notes, you can use it to keep your ID number or tax ID at hand.

Avoid going through your wallet every time someone asks for your social security number!

★ Use important notes to:
• Record your blood type
• Keep your tax id
• Keep your social security number
• Store the code for your apartment building entrance
• Store your account number

★ Import Notes allows you to:
✓ Quickly access your notes on your wrist!
✓ Quickly access your notes on your home screen
✓ Easily share your account number with your friends
✓ Create as many notes as you want
✓ Customize each note as pair type/value
✓ Order your notes as you wish
✓ Backup your notes

If you have any suggestions please do not hesitate to email us at andregpslourenco@gmail.com.
We appreciate your feedback, please rate us!
With love, KISS
comments: Does not have option to go next line.... continued typing is not good
Good idea, but drag and drop doesn't work
